comment: The value of the finite recursive definition generator at a successor (special case where the characteristic function is a mapping abstraction and where the mapping class ` D ` is a proper class). This is a technical lemma that can be used together with ~ frsucmpt to help eliminate redundant sethood antecedents. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 19-Feb-2011.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 11-Sep-2015.)
